issue.title: Missing support for concave mesh in bullet

content.raw:
Notes:

Current tests with convex decomposition can take up to 1 minute of processing time for models such as [the gas station](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/src/cd1aa148368c5b18ae62e765630ab466e6e28f26/gas_station/?at=default).  The long processing time makes dynamic loading and doing convex decomp on demand impractical.  A preprocessor or alternative collision detection approach is needed.
content.html:
Notes:

Current tests with convex decomposition can take up to 1 minute of processing time for models such as the gas station. The long processing time makes dynamic loading and doing convex decomp on demand impractical. A preprocessor or alternative collision detection approach is needed.
